entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of snow in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
